com.foxhole.tools.spartan.managers.render
Class RenderManager

java.lang.Object
  com.foxhole.tools.spartan.managers.render.RenderManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISpartanManager
public class RenderManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISpartanManager

The render manager is responsible for rendering all the registered forms into the screen The user registers the forms into "layers" available in the render manager (also created by the player)

Author:
Tiago "Spiegel" Costa

 float translationX
          The X coordinate translation for the render manager

          The Y coordinate translation for the render manager

          Creates a new "layer" to add forms, this layer is added on top of all layers and is rendered in the last.

          Creates a new "layer" to add forms, this layer is added by priority within all the remaining layers and is rendered by that order.

Constructor Detail

RenderManager

public RenderManager()

Method Detail

getInstance

public static RenderManager getInstance()
Obtains the current active instance of the render manager

Returns:
a handle the current active instance of the render manager, null if no active instance is selected

reset

public void reset()
Erases all forms from this manager

addNewVirtualGameSpace

public VirtualGameSpace addNewVirtualGameSpace(java.lang.String name)
Creates a new "layer" to add forms, this layer is added on top of all layers and is rendered in the last.

Parameters:
name - the name and identifier of the layer
Returns:
A virtualGameSpace handle that represents the new layer

addNewVirtualGameSpace

public VirtualGameSpace addNewVirtualGameSpace(java.lang.String name,
                                               int priority)
Creates a new "layer" to add forms, this layer is added by priority within all the remaining layers and is rendered by that order.

Parameters:
name - the name and identifier of the layer
priority - the priority of the layer, the bigger the number the more in front the layer is
Returns:
A virtualGameSpace handle that represents the new layer

removeVirtualGameSpace

public void removeVirtualGameSpace(java.lang.String name)
Removes a layer from the render manager, eliminating all forms contained inside

Parameters:
name - the identifier of the layer

setDebugInfo

public void setDebugInfo(boolean debugInfo)
Sets the debug info for the render manager When turned on, it will show the FPS, number of entities and number of forms rendered, as well as the collision boxes for all the forms that have them.

Parameters:
debugInfo - a boolean representing the value chosen

render

public void render(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
                   org.newdawn.slick.state.StateBasedGame sbg,
                   org.newdawn.slick.Graphics graphics)
Performs the rendering of all layers and forms

Parameters:
gc - a handle for the active slick game container
sbg - a handle for the active state base game (null if no slick2d states are used)
graphics - a handle to the slick2d graphics

removeForm

public void removeForm(IGameFormObject form)
Removes a form from the render manager

Parameters:
form - a handle to he form to remove

translate

public void translate(float translationX,
                      float translationY)
Translate the viewport by x,y addinf to the current viewpoint position

Parameters:
translationX - the amount of coordinate X to add
translationY - the amount of coordinate Y to add

getVirtualSpace

public VirtualGameSpace getVirtualSpace(java.lang.String layerName)
Obtains a layer from the render manager

Parameters:
layerName - the identifier of the layer
Returns:
a handle to the virtual game space representing the layer, null if none is found
